name: Blitz: The League
description: The game which revolutionized pro football is back. Step on the field with a team more customizable than ever. Additional cities, logos, and unlockable players will help create the greatest franchise in sports. Take your team online to defeat all challengers using new Quarterback evasions or try to defeat the newest All-Start teams from the 3 divisions while surviving new torrential weather effects. Join football bad boy Bill Romanowski on another dramatic season of football and experience The League like never before.
